attributes.action: Encorage the building of the Mega Mosque in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The building of such a mosque will show London as the multi cultural city it claims to be.
If people want to build a place to worship and can find a way to fund the development it should be a matter for the planning department of the local council and the local community in the same way as the building of a new supermarket would be.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
